propertyDetails.propertyDescription:
This Toronto area eco-friendly hotel is just 2 km from the Toronto Pearson Airport via a direct, free train.
 Alt Hotel Toronto Airport has been welcoming guests since 22 May 2012.
propertyDetails.houseRules:
Cancellation and prepayment policies vary according to accommodation type.
 Please check what conditions may apply to each option when making your selection. 
 The minimum age for check-in is 18. 
 Pets are allowed on request. 
 Charges may be applicable.
propertyDetails.amenities:
A seating area and a work desk are provided in the contemporary rooms at Alt Hotel Toronto Airport. 
 Free Wi-Fi is provided and free toiletries are available. 
 A fitness room is on site and a 24-hour reception is featured for maximum guest convenience. 
 A grab-and-go breakfast, lunch and dinner is available at the Toronto Airport Alt Hotel.

propertyDetails.propertyDescription:
Featuring a garden, Riviera Plaza and Conference Centre Calgary Airport is set in Calgary in the Alberta region, 8 km from Calgary Zoo Botanical Garden & Prehistoric Park and 9 km from Calgary Tower.
 Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and an ATM, along with free WiFi throughout the property.
 The hotel features family rooms.
propertyDetails.houseRules:
A damage deposit of CAD 100 is required on arrival.
 This will be collected by credit card.
 You should be reimbursed on check-out.
 Your deposit will be refunded in full via credit card, subject to an inspection of the property.
 Children aged 18 years and above are considered adults at this property.
propertyDetails.amenities:
Free public parking is possible on site (reservation is not needed). 
 WiFi is available in all areas and is free of charge. 
 Vending machine available

propertyDetails.propertyDescription:
Country Hills Golf Course is 11 minutes’ drive and Nose Hill Park is 13 minutes’ drive from Comfort Inn & Suites. 
 Calgary city centre is only 18 km away. 
 You're eligible for a Genius discount at Comfort Inn & Suites Airport North! 
 To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.
propertyDetails.houseRules:
Cancellation and prepayment policies vary according to accommodation type. 
 Please check what conditions may apply to each option when making your selection. 
 There is no capacity for extra beds at this property. 
 Pets are not allowed. 
 When booking more than 5 rooms, different policies and additional supplements may apply.
propertyDetails.amenities:
1 swimming pool.
 Airport shuttle (free).
 Non-smoking rooms.
 Good fitness centre.
 Facilities for disabled guests.
 Free parking.
 Breakfast.

propertyDetails.propertyDescription:
Just 6 minutes' drive from Calgary International Airport, this hotel provides an on-site restaurant and a free airport shuttle (5 am - 1 am daily). 
 Highway 2 is just 5 minutes' drive away. 
 Harvest Hills Golf Course is 5 km from Acclaim Hotel Calgary Airport.
propertyDetails.houseRules:
Cancellation and prepayment policies vary according to accommodation type.

 There is no capacity for cots at this property. 
 The minimum age for check-in is 18.Pets are allowed- Charges may be applicable.

propertyDetails.propertyDescription:
Just 6 minutes' drive from Calgary International Airport, this hotel provides an on-site restaurant and a free airport shuttle (5 am - 1 am daily). 
 The rooftop Sky Deck at Hotel Acclaim Calgary Airport features jetted spa tubs.
 A fitness centre is available to all guests.
 A business centre is on site and dry cleaning services can be arranged.
